item.description:
The next Star Trek movie comes out in May... So I thought I would get a head start on this and post it now (1/12/09).

This Star Trek starts out with Kirk as a young boy and profiles him as he gets command of the first Starship to fly out of the newly formed Star Fleet command. Movie takes a spin like Batman did - "The beginning is Now". Leonard Nimoy is supposed to be in it too - that should be interesting given he is now like 80 or something. Film comes out May 8th - so we'll pick a week later for the date: May 16th. Get your communicators ready....


Update: Movie at 7:35 PM. We will be going in the theatre at 7:20 PM. After 7:20 PM you can call me or text me on my cell phone. Cell Phone will be given to the Yes's and Maybe's on Friday.
item.how_to_find_us: Will be standing in front of Chatters Resuraunt inside
item.name: Star Trek The movie
